controllers.GestionnairesUnivers

Class BaseGestionnaireUnivers

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GestionnairesUnivers.BaseGestionnaireUnivers
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GestionnaireMedieval, GestionnaireWestern

    public abstract class BaseGestionnaireUnivers
extends Object
    The universe controller, which defines methods wrapping Personnage that will then get called by CRUDPersonnage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseGestionnaireUnivers

    • Method Detail

      • confier

        public String confier(Chef chef,
                      Soldat soldat)
        Associates a chef to a given soldier (using Soldat.setChef(Chef)). And append the soldier to the chef's subordinated soldiers list (see Chef.ajouterSoldat(Soldat)). The association can fail (death of one of the targets), which triggers a custom message (if any).
        Parameters:
        chef - The chief that will receive a new soldier under their orders.
        soldat - The soldier to associate the chef to.
        Returns:
        The universe's custom message, if any. Depending on the success or the failure from an invalid move.

      • creerChef

        public abstract Chef creerChef(int id,
                               String nom,
                               String qualificatif,
                               int force)
        Wraps a inherited Chef constructor, allowing to define which derived Chef to use. Instead uncleanly using and passing a Class's reflection around.
        Parameters:
        id - The chef's identifier.
        nom - The chef's names.
        qualificatif - The chef's full name prefix.
        force - The chef's hitting force, if any. May not be supported by the current universe.
        Returns:
        The created chef's instance.

      • creerSoldat

        public abstract Soldat creerSoldat(int id,
                                   String nom,
                                   int force)
        Wraps a inherited Soldat constructor, allowing to define which derived Soldat to use. Instead uncleanly using and passing a Class's reflection around.
        Parameters:
        id - The soldier's identifier.
        nom - The soldier's names.
        force - The soldier's hitting force.
        Returns:
        The created soldier's instance.

      • frapper

        public abstract String frapper(Personnage agresseur,
                               Personnage victime)
        Wraps a Personnage.frapper(Personnage) handling any invalid moves (exceptions) that could occur. Customizing the messages depending on the derived BaseGestionnaireUnivers set by the current universe.
        Parameters:
        agresseur - The character that wants to hit someone.
        victime - The character that is or may be going to get hit, if the move is possible.
        Returns:
        Whatever message to show if that's an invalid move or a success.
